data.Sentence_cn: 我穿过马路以便避开他，但他看到我并朝我跑过来。
data.Sentence: I crossed the street to avoid meeting him, but he saw me and came running towards me.

data.Sentence_cn: 若再装作没看见他已是没有用了，我只好向他招手。
data.Sentence: It was no use pretending that I had not seen him, so I waved to him.

data.Sentence_cn: 我就怕遇到奈杰尔.戴克斯。
data.Sentence: I never enjoy meeting Nigel Dykes.
He never has anything to do.

data.Sentence_cn: 不管你多忙，他总是坚持要跟你去。
data.Sentence: No matter how busy you are, he always insists on coming with you.

data.Sentence_cn: 我得想办法不让他整个上午缠着我。
data.Sentence: I had to think of a way of preventing him from following me around all morning.

data.Sentence_cn: “你好，奈杰尔，想不到在这儿见到你。”我说。
data.Sentence: 'Hello, Nigel,' I said. 'Fancy meeting you here!'

data.Sentence_cn: “你好，伊丽莎白，”奈杰尔回答说，
“我正不知道怎么消磨这一上午呢，正好见到好。你不忙，是吗？”
data.Sentence: 'I was just wondering how to spend the morning -- until I saw you. You're not busy doing anything, are you?
'No, not at all,' I answered. 'I'm going to...'

data.Sentence_cn: “我跟你一道去行吗？”没等我说完话他就问道。
data.Sentence: 'Would you mind my coming with you?' he asked, before I had finished speaking.

data.Sentence_cn: “没关系，但我准备去牙医那里。”我说了个谎。
data.Sentence: 'Not at all,' I lied, 'but I'm going to the dentist.'

data.Sentence_cn: “那我也跟你去，候诊室里总有很多东西可供阅读！”他回答。
data.Sentence: 'Then I'll come with you,' he answered. 'There's always plenty to read in the waiting room!'
